localizedText.DESC_HTML_ERRORS: For security reasons, this error output should be disabled.
localizedText.DESC_SCRIPT_TIMEOUT: Timeout after which the execution of a Lua script is aborted.
localizedText.LOG_PAGE_MAX_ENTRIES: Max entries to be displayed on the log page
localizedText.DESC_LOG_PAGE_MAX_ENTRIES: If this value is reached, the events will be displayed on several pages
localizedText.CONFIG_PAGE_ARRAY_LIMIT: Maximum number of array entries in the configuration
localizedText.DESC_CONFIG_PAGE_ARRAY_LIMIT: Maximum number of array entries displayed on the configuration page
